page.title: 05A.T.Oliver and Sons Ltd.
page.content: Oliver's sell all machinery used by farmers.They sell tractors that are used for different jobs.Big ploughing tractors cost up to Â£40,000. The small tractors that are used for gardens cost between Â£3,000 and Â£4,000.The other equipment, such as combine harvesters cost Â£20,000 to Â£80,000,and a baler costs Â£5,000 to Â£20,000.Oliver's sell other equipment. A lawnmower could cost between Â£100 and Â£10,000.Vans cost Â£4,000.They have big vans which cost Â£6,000.Their orders mainly come from farmers. There are 120 people who work for Oliver's.People can join Oliver's when they leave school.They start to train in the workshop for four years.During that time, they are taught to be mechanics if they would like to work on machines.They would be taught paper and office work if they would prefer
